briefTitle: Improving Access to Control of Diseases for Women
officialTitle: Improving Access to Control of Diseases for Women
conditions: Cardio-vascular Disease, Stroke Cancer, Breast Cancer, Oral Cancer, Cervical Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women between 30 to 60 years residing in the villages of the Gogunda block in the district of Udaipur in Rajasthan, India, will be eligible to participate.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women suffering from debilitating illnesses, pregnant women and women refusing to participate will be excluded.
